summary: EXPLOSION SOUND HEARD UNDER DASHBOARD OF VEHICLE, CONSUMER SUSPECTED PROBLEMS WITH AIR BAGS.  *MR   THE EXPLOSION WAS HEARD ON TWO SEPARATE OCCASIONS.  DEALER STATED WAS NOT AUTHORIZED TO OPEN THE AIR BAG COMPARTMENT.   FIVE YEARS LATER, CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE REGARDING THE AIR BAGS.     *TT  *JB
